sentences.en: A cement mixer agitates the cement until it is ready to pour.
sentences.cn: 水泥搅拌机把水泥搅动得可以倒出来用为止.

sentences.en: According to technological requirement, 20 Cubic liter mixer machine has designed.
sentences.cn: 按照工艺技术要求设计20立升高速混合机.

sentences.en: Cooper was a good mixer, he was popular.
sentences.cn: 库珀擅长交际，人缘很好。

sentences.en: Description: The HP Agilent 5364 A is a used Microwave Mixer Detector.
sentences.cn: 描述: 惠普安捷伦5364A是一种用于微波混频器检测器.

sentences.en: He is a good ( bad ) mixer.
sentences.cn: 他是个易 ( 难 ) 相处的人.

sentences.en: Our concrete material is mixed in a rotating - drum batch mixer at the job site.
sentences.cn: 我们用的混凝土是在现场的间歇式转筒搅拌机中搅拌的.

sentences.en: Product utilized as both a stand alone beverage and mixer.
sentences.cn: 本品既可单独作为饮料出售,亦是绝佳的混合产品.

sentences.en: Remove the flask the vacuum mixer and place in the oven.
sentences.cn: 从真空机内取出铸造瓶﹐然后放在焗炉内.

sentences.en: The " pony " type of mixer is also a steel fabricated cylindrical tank and plain internally.
sentences.cn: “ 小筒 ” 型和膏机也是一种钢制的圆形的同筒形槽而内部是平的.

sentences.en: The heat CO 2 generator comprises the CO 2 heater, nebulizer and mixer.
sentences.cn: 热湿CO2发生器由CO2加热器 、 雾化器和混合器构成.

sentences.en: The scientists considered putting a small mechanical mixer in the storage tank.
sentences.cn: 科学家们考虑在储存罐里放进小型机械搅拌机.

sentences.en: This kind of mixer produces light, silky, even-textured batters.
sentences.cn: 这种搅拌机能搅拌出稀薄、柔滑、质地均匀的面糊。

sentences.en: We may refer to such a cell as a perfect mixer.
sentences.cn: 我们可以把这样的单元称为理想混合器.

sentences.en: You can take the mixer apart to clean it.
sentences.cn: 你可以把搅拌器拆开来清洁.
